Systems House
Unit 8 Trostre Industrial Est

partnerDetails.about:
Formed in 1984 in South Wales to service the needs of heavy industry, HAC has grown to service the UK and abroad from three UK based locations. We pride ourselves on the solutions we provide with our company moto "Once our customer, Always our Customer"

We are able to offer the following services:

Design - Using the latest AutoCad software(s), Elektrika quotations tool, and a range of Schneider Automation software(s)

Manufacture - From DB Boards to Fully Withdrawable Floor Standing LV Switchgear including Schneider KQ, Isobar, Powerpact, Prisma P, Prisma G and Berger Lahr Motion products.

Testing, Servicing and Maintenance - We carry the following equipment for testing and maintenance: 
Copper bending, punching and modification equipment (fixed and mobile), Flash Testers, Megger Testers, Ductor Testers, Primary and Secondary Injection Testing, Thermal Imaging and Micrologic analysis.
We can provide on site retro fits and upgrades for most of the leading manufacturers.

PLC Programming and Control - We write software in house using a range of Schneider software(s) from bespoke machinery to PLC changeover systems, load shedding and ATS panels.

Metering, Instrumentation and Power Factor Correction - We can provide cost effective and energy saving products in metering and Power Factor Correction, as well as having a Power Analyzer to help track down any voltage supply issues you may be experiencing. 

BMS, HVAC and Control - We can provide BMS and HVAC control in house as well as points drawings to your specification.

Motor Control Centres / Hybrid MCC Panels - As an intelligent systems integrator we are able to provide motor control centers including VSDs, DOLs, SCADA and Networked systems as well as hybrid power and control panels to suit your needs.

Bus Bar and Transformers - We are partnered with major manufacturers to be able to supply a one stop shop from TXs, Bus Bar Distribution all the way to final assembly products. 

HAC are now in the hands of our second generation of Directors with a proven longevity in the industry, we look forward to making lasting business relationships with our customers.
